Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C5t.name: token
Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C5t.abstract: The token of MPush, this cannot be empty. If so, MPush will throw an error.

Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C8r.name: register(toTopic:success:failure:)
Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C8r.abstract: Register the current device to a topic

Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C8r.name: register(toTopics:success:failure:)
Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C8r.abstract: Register the current device to an array of topics

Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C10.name: unregister(fromTopic:success:failure:)
Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C10.abstract: Unregister the current device from a topic, the topic is matched using the code of the topic

Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C10.name: unregister(fromTopics:success:failure:)
Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C10.abstract: Unregister the current device from an array of topics, topics are matched using the code

Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C23.name: unregisterFromAllTopics(success:failure:)
Classes/MPush.html#/s:10MPushSwift0A0C23.abstract: Unregister the current device from all topics is registred to

Classes/MPTopic.html#/s:10MPushSwift7MPT.name: title
Classes/MPTopic.html#/s:10MPushSwift7MPT.abstract: An optional title for the topic, if not set the code will be used

Classes/MPTopic.html#/s:10MPushSwift7MPT.name: single
Classes/MPTopic.html#/s:10MPushSwift7MPT.abstract: If the topic identify a single user or a group of users, defaults to false

Classes/MPTopic.html#/s:10MPushSwift7MPT.name: init(_:title:single:)
Classes/MPTopic.html#/s:10MPushSwift7MPT.abstract: Initializes a new MPush topic with the data passed

Classes/MPush.html.name: MPush
Classes/MPush.html.abstract: The MPush class used to do all the interactions with the service
